short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects youtube shorts to the normal player

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces the "/shorts/" from the url with "watch?v=" to play your shorts video on the normal player which is more user friendly on a computer.
